sys_data_source.name: 01.3 - Person Phone Migration
sys_data_source.sql_statement: select DISTINCT p.person_id, p.work_phone AS phone_number, p.work_extension, 'work' AS phone_type, c.times_available from cacmdba.person p left join cacmdba.complainant c on p.person_id = c.person_id left join CACMDBA.COMPLAINT cc on p.person_id = cc.person_id where cc.complaint_id is not null and ((p.work_phone <> '(___) ___-____' and p.work_phone <> '( ) - ' and p.work_phone <> '( ) -' and p.work_phone is not null) OR (p.work_extension is not null and p.work_extension not like '% %' and p.work_extension <> '_____')) UNION select DISTINCT p.person_id, p.home_phone, null as work_extension, 'home' AS phone_type, c.times_available from cacmdba.person p left join cacmdba.complainant c on p.person_id = c.person_id left join CACMDBA.COMPLAINT cc on p.person_id = cc.person_id where cc.complaint_id is not null and p.home_phone <> '(___) ___-____' and p.home_phone <> '( ) - ' and p.home_phone <> '( ) -' and p.work_phone is not null UNION select DISTINCT p.person_id, p.mobil_phone, null as work_extension, 'cell' AS phone_type, c.times_available from cacmdba.person p left join cacmdba.complainant c on p.person_id = c.person_id left join CACMDBA.COMPLAINT cc on p.person_id = cc.person_id where cc.complaint_id is not null and p.mobil_phone <> '(___) ___-____' and p.mobil_phone <> '( ) - ' and p.mobil_phone <> '( ) -' and p.mobil_phone is not null UNION select DISTINCT p.person_id, p.fax, null as work_extension, 'fax' AS phone_type, c.times_available from cacmdba.person p left join cacmdba.complainant c on p.person_id = c.person_id left join CACMDBA.COMPLAINT cc on p.person_id = cc.person_id where cc.complaint_id is not null and p.fax <> '(___) ___-____' and p.fax <> '( ) - ' and p.fax <> '( ) -' and p.fax is not null and fax <> ' '
